detail_desc: Sleeveless playsuit in airy viscose with a print motif at the top and crossover straps at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
Straight-cut top in patterned jersey with a text print, rib-trimmed V-neck, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Tunic in an airy, patterned weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Gathered seam at the waist and long sleeves with narrow elastication, a bow and frill trim at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Windproof running jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a brushed thermal inside. Zip down the front, a hood, a small, zipped chest pocket, thumbholes at the cuffs and reflective details. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short dress in an airy viscose and cotton weave with a collar and V-neck opening at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an asymmetric seam with gathers at the waist for added width. Unlined.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with long sleeves, an open chest pocket and slits at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut dress in woven fabric with short, open sleeves with ties. Unlined.

Trousers in softly draping viscose twill with wide elastication and a tie belt at the waist, a frill trim at the top and a fake fly. Side pockets and flap leg pockets with a button. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Thin outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets, elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem.
Low-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.

Long dress in a nylon rustle weave with a concealed zip at the back. Short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs and covered buttons, a yoke at the top and a gathered seam above the hem for added width. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch flexible denim with a high comfort factor. Hard-worn details that are patched on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, side pockets and raw edges. No fasteners.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an embroidered appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Round-necked jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a wide, foldover hem.
Tote bag in a cotton weave with a print motif and two handles at the top. Size 35x41 cm.
Velvet-covered Alice band attached to a large felt hat with faux fur pompoms and imitation leather details.

Pyjamas in a soft, airy fine knit. Top with a print motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and an elasticated hem with a decorative satin bow. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Short, flounced dress in an airy weave with a V-neck, short raglan sleeves and a gathered seam at the waist. Partly lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.

Set with a top, pair of leggings and a hairband in soft cotton. Longer top in sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a ribbed hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in jersey with a knot detail at the front.
Calf-length skirt in satin with visible seams. High waist with a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Flared shirt in a cotton poplin weave with a gathered grandad collar, buttons down the front and wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Top in soft, airy cotton jersey with a jersey-lined, wrapover-front hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Loose fit.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a small embroidered detail on the chest. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in jersey with a wrapover front that has ties at one side, short sleeves and a flounce-trimmed hem.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and short sleeves. Unlined.
Sleeveless sports top in jersey with a mesh-lined hood with a drawstring and collar, and a rounded hem.
Bras in microfibre with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with a V-neck, pleat at the back and stand up collar with wide ties at the front. Lined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Flower-shaped earrings in thin metal wire. Diameter 4 cm.
Cardigan knitted in slub yarn made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Loose-knit jumper in tape yarn with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer at the back.
Smocked strappy top in a cotton weave with frill trims and wide, tie-top shoulder straps.

Shirt in premium cotton with a grandad collar, French front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Derby shoes in imitation suede with open lacing at the front and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and crêpe soles. Heel 2 cm.
Jumpsuit in sequined jersey containing glittery threads with a wrapover, draped bodice, long sleeves, elasticated seam at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with a high waist and raw-edge hems.
Short-sleeved top in a viscose crêpe weave with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Swim shorts in a block-coloured stretch weave with lacing and elastication at the waist, a fly with a hook and loop fastening and side pockets. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of dungarees in soft organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Dungarees with straps that fasten at the front and full feet.

Shirt in a jacquard-weave cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular, adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Fully lined printed swimsuit.

Bra top in jersey that gives the bust a natural shape and light support. Lined front and folded, glued edges at the top for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes. Wide shoulder straps. No fasteners.
Blouse in slub-weave viscose with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with smocked trims.
Set with a top and skirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. Sleeveless top with a tie detail at the hem. Bell-shaped skirt with a visible elastic waistband. Unlined.
Metal hair clips decorated with fabric butterflies. Length 3.5 cm.
Thigh boots in imitation suede with a soft, stretchy shaft. Rounded toes and block heels. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Fine-knit pointelle cardigan in a soft viscose blend with dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and no buttons. Ribbing at the cuffs, hem and along the side seams and front opening.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Short coat in a sturdy wool blend with notch lapels, a concealed press-stud at the front, concealed side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Short dungaree dress in washed, stretch denim with adjustable shoulder straps, a chest pocket, and buttons at the sides. Unlined.
Bikini top with lightly padded cups, wide adjustable shoulder straps for good support, and a metal fastener at the back.

Shirt jacket in sturdy twill with a collar, zip down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, sleeves with a slit and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Straight-cut kimono jacket in sturdy viscose with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Treggings in stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned weave with a wrapover front, tie at the waist and frills down the front and at the cuffs.
Jumpsuit in pleated jersey with a sheen. Round neckline, short, flounced sleeves, an elasticated waist with a decorative knot detail at the front and straight, ankle-length legs.
Fitted, calf-length dress in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. High collar, long ties at the waist, a wrapover and open section at the back, and slits in the sides. Lined.

Ribbed cardigan knitted in a soft cotton blend in a slightly boxy style with dropped shoulders, and long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. No buttons.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Double-layered tube scarf in fine-knit wool with a small imitation leather appliqué at one edge.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and quilted imitation leather sections on the shoulders. Kangaroo pocket, diagonal side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
